# Do not edit this file

set(LLVM_TARGET_DEFINITIONS Codasip.td)

tablegen(LLVM CodasipGenRegisterInfo.inc -gen-register-info)
tablegen(LLVM CodasipGenInstrInfo.inc -gen-instr-info)
tablegen(LLVM CodasipGenAsmWriter.inc -gen-asm-writer)
tablegen(LLVM CodasipGenDAGISel.inc -gen-dag-isel)
tablegen(LLVM CodasipGenCallingConv.inc -gen-callingconv)
tablegen(LLVM CodasipGenSubtargetInfo.inc -gen-subtarget)
tablegen(LLVM CodasipGenMCCodeEmitter.inc -gen-emitter)
tablegen(LLVM CodasipGenAsmMatcher.inc -gen-asm-matcher)
tablegen(LLVM CodasipGenDisassemblerTables.inc -gen-disassembler)
add_public_tablegen_target(CodasipCommonTableGen)

add_llvm_target(CodasipGenCodeGen
  CodasipMachineFunction.cpp
  CodasipGenMachineFunction.cpp
  CodasipAsmPrinter.cpp
  CodasipFrameLowering.cpp
  CodasipGenFrameLowering.cpp
  CodasipGenInstrInfo.cpp
  CodasipGenISelLowering.cpp
  CodasipGenRegisterInfo.cpp
  CodasipGenSelectionDAGInfo.cpp
  CodasipHazardRec.cpp
  CodasipInstrInfo.cpp
  CodasipInstructionSemantics.cpp
  CodasipISelDAGToDAG.cpp
  CodasipISelLowering.cpp
  CodasipJumpLengthCheck.cpp
  CodasipJumpInfo.cpp
  CodasipMCExpr.cpp
  CodasipMiscPasses.cpp
  CodasipMoiOptim.cpp
  CodasipNoopAdder.cpp
  CodasipRegisterInfo.cpp
  CodasipSelectionDAGInfo.cpp
  CodasipSubtarget.cpp
  CodasipTargetMachine.cpp
  CodasipTargetObjectFile.cpp
  CodasipSequencer.cpp
  CodasipPeephole.cpp
  CodasipInstrSizeOptim.cpp
  CodasipGenPassConfig.cpp
  CodasipCustPassConfig.cpp
  CodasipDoubleJumpPass.cpp
  CodasipVliwNoopAdder.cpp
  CodasipCfiAdder.cpp
  CodasipPropagateBuiltinConstants.cpp
  CodasipTargetTransformInfo.cpp
  )

add_dependencies(LLVMCodasipGenCodeGen CodasipCommonTableGen LLVMCodasipGenDisassembler LLVMCodasipGenAsmParser)

add_subdirectory(AsmParser)
add_subdirectory(Disassembler)
add_subdirectory(InstPrinter)
add_subdirectory(TargetInfo)
add_subdirectory(MCTargetDesc)
add_subdirectory(CustomModules)
